alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 7:35PM EDT until August 04 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Eastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 735 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crawfordville to near St. Marks, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Shadeville, Bald Point, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Tully, Panacea, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Spring Creek and Liveoak Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
